attributes.action: Create a law like the Scottish MP's did to end 'gazumping' & 'gazundering'.
attributes.additional_details: The Scottish government created a law some years ago to end the cheating and disrespectful culture of gazumping and gazundering. To put it in plain English, people who place an offer on a property should be forced to see that offer through, as should the vendors of that property. No 'someone has come in at the last minute to place a higher offer'. No 'I've decided to reduce my offer as the house doesn't look as nice on a wet day'. The U.K. should follow the Scots example on property law.
attributes.background: End the cheating and disrespectful culture of gazumping and gazundering. To put it in plain English, people who place an offer on a property should be forced to see that offer through, as should the vendors of that property. The U.K. should follow the Scottish governments example on property law.
